CREATE TABLE AggAQI (
    date DATE,
    avg_us_aqi FLOAT
);
GO

-- Insert data into AggAQI
INSERT INTO AggAQI (
    date, 
    avg_us_aqi
)
SELECT 
    date,
    avg_us_aqi
FROM 
    ExternalAggAQI
GO

-- Create AggBikeStations table with matching data types (internal sql table)

CREATE TABLE AggBikeStations (
    station_name NVARCHAR(100), 
    station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    count INT,
    Latitude FLOAT,
    Longitude FLOAT,
    status NVARCHAR(100),
    District NVARCHAR(100),
    docks INT
);
GO

-- Insert data into AggBlueBike
INSERT INTO AggBikeStations (
    station_name,
    station_id,
    count,
    Latitude,
    Longitude,
    status,
    District,
    docks
)
SELECT
    station_name,
    station_id,
    count,
    Latitude,
    Longitude,
    status,
    District,
    docks
FROM 
    ExternalAggBikeStations;
GO

-- Create AggBlueBike table with matching data types (internal sql table)
CREATE TABLE AggBlueBike (
    date DATE, 
    riders INT,
    trips INT,
    stations INT,
    bikes_lost INT,
    bikes_not_returned INT,
    not_start_at_dock INT,
    avg_distance FLOAT,
    avg_duration FLOAT,
    avg_duration_min FLOAT,
    avg_duration_h FLOAT,
    avg_speed_ms FLOAT,
    avg_speed_kmh FLOAT,
    max_distance FLOAT,
    max_duration FLOAT,
    max_duration_min FLOAT,
    max_duration_h FLOAT,
    max_speed_ms FLOAT,
    max_speed_kmh FLOAT
);
GO

-- Insert data into AggBlueBike
INSERT INTO AggBlueBike (
    date, 
    riders,
    trips,
    stations,
    bikes_lost,
    bikes_not_returned,
    not_start_at_dock,
    avg_distance,
    avg_duration,
    avg_duration_min,
    avg_duration_h,
    avg_speed_ms,
    avg_speed_kmh,
    max_distance,
    max_duration,
    max_duration_min,
    max_duration_h,
    max_speed_ms,
    max_speed_kmh
)
SELECT
    date, 
    riders,
    trips,
    stations,
    bikes_lost,
    bikes_not_returned,
    not_start_at_dock,
    avg_distance,
    avg_duration,
    avg_duration_min,
    avg_duration_h,
    avg_speed_ms,
    avg_speed_kmh,
    max_distance,
    max_duration,
    max_duration_min,
    max_duration_h,
    max_speed_ms,
    max_speed_kmh
FROM 
    ExternalAggBluebike;
GO

CREATE TABLE AggPollutants (
    date DATE,
    avg_co FLOAT,
    avg_no2 FLOAT,
    avg_o3 FLOAT,
    avg_so2 FLOAT,
    avg_pm2_5 FLOAT,
    avg_pm10 FLOAT
);
GO

-- Insert data into AggPollutants
INSERT INTO AggPollutants (date, avg_co, avg_no2, avg_o3, avg_so2, avg_pm2_5, avg_pm10)
SELECT 
    date,
    avg_co,
    avg_no2,
    avg_o3,
    avg_so2,
    avg_pm2_5,
    avg_pm10
FROM 
    ExternalAggPollutants
GO

);
GO

GO

-- Create the AggWeather table
CREATE TABLE AggWeather (
    date DATE,
    avg_temp_C FLOAT, 
    avg_humidity FLOAT,
    avg_wind_speed FLOAT,
    max_temp_F FLOAT,
    min_temp_F FLOAT,
    weather_records BIGINT
);
GO

-- Insert data into AggWeather
INSERT INTO AggWeather (date, avg_temp_C, avg_humidity, avg_wind_speed, max_temp_F, min_temp_F, weather_records)
SELECT 
    date,
    avg_temp_C, 
    avg_humidity,
    avg_wind_speed,
    max_temp_F,
    min_temp_F,
    weather_records
FROM 
    ExternalAggWeather
GO

-- Create and load AirPollution table
CREATE TABLE AirPollution (
    lon FLOAT,
    lat FLOAT,
    aqi INT,
    co FLOAT,
    no FLOAT,
    no2 FLOAT,
    o3 FLOAT,
    so2 FLOAT,
    pm2_5 FLOAT,
    pm10 FLOAT,
    nh3 FLOAT,
    corrected_timestamp INT,
    location NVARCHAR(100),
    date_time DATETIME,
    id NVARCHAR(100),
    o3_8hr FLOAT,
    o3_1hr FLOAT,
    pm2_5_24hr FLOAT,
    pm10_24hr FLOAT,
    co_8hr FLOAT,
    so2_1hr FLOAT,
    so2_24hr FLOAT,
    no2_1hr FLOAT,
    us_aqi INT,
    date DATE
);
GO

INSERT INTO AirPollution (
    lon,
    lat,
    aqi,
    co,
    no,
    no2,
    o3,
    so2,
    pm2_5,
    pm10,
    nh3,
    corrected_timestamp,
    location,
    date_time,
    id,
    o3_8hr,
    o3_1hr,
    pm2_5_24hr,
    pm10_24hr,
    co_8hr,
    so2_1hr,
    so2_24hr,
    no2_1hr,
    us_aqi,
    date
)
SELECT
    lon,
    lat,
    aqi,
    co,
    no,
    no2,
    o3,
    so2,
    pm2_5,
    pm10,
    nh3,
    corrected_timestamp,
    location,
    date_time,
    id,
    o3_8hr,
    o3_1hr,
    pm2_5_24hr,
    pm10_24hr,
    co_8hr,
    so2_1hr,
    so2_24hr,
    no2_1hr,
    us_aqi,
    CAST(date_time AS DATE) AS date
FROM
    ExternalAirPollution;

-- Create BikeStation table with matching data types (internal sql table)

CREATE TABLE BikeStation (
    Number NVARCHAR(100), 
    Name NVARCHAR(200),
    Latitude FLOAT,
    Longitude FLOAT,
    status NVARCHAR(100),
    District NVARCHAR(100),
    docks INT
);
GO

-- Insert data into AggBlueBike
INSERT INTO BikeStation (
    Number, 
    Name,
    Latitude,
    Longitude,
    status,
    District,
    docks
)
SELECT
    Number, 
    Name,
    Latitude,
    Longitude,
    status,
    District,
    docks
FROM 
    ExternalBikeStation;
GO

-- Create BlueBike table with matching data types (internal sql table)
CREATE TABLE BlueBike (
    ride_id NVARCHAR(100),
    rideable_type NVARCHAR(100),
    started_at DATETIME,
    ended_at DATETIME,
    start_station_name NVARCHAR(100),
    start_station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    end_station_name NVARCHAR(100),
    end_station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    start_lat FLOAT,
    start_lng FLOAT,
    end_lat FLOAT,
    end_lng FLOAT,
    member_casual NVARCHAR(100),
    is_bike_lost INT,
    is_return_to_dock INT,
    is_start_from_dock INT,
    distance FLOAT,
    duration FLOAT,
    speed_ms FLOAT,
    speed_kmh FLOAT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    is_not_return_to_dock INT,
    is_not_start_from_dock INT,
    duration_min FLOAT,
    duration_h FLOAT
);
GO

-- Insert data into BlueBike
INSERT INTO BlueBike (
    ride_id,
    rideable_type,
    started_at,
    ended_at,
    start_station_name,
    start_station_id,
    end_station_name,
    end_station_id,
    start_lat,
    start_lng,
    end_lat,
    end_lng,
    member_casual,
    is_bike_lost,
    is_return_to_dock,
    is_start_from_dock,
    distance,
    duration,
    speed_ms,
    speed_kmh,
    start_date,
    end_date,
    is_not_return_to_dock,
    is_not_start_from_dock,
    duration_min,
    duration_h
)
SELECT
    ride_id,
    rideable_type,
    started_at,
    ended_at,
    start_station_name,
    start_station_id,
    end_station_name,
    end_station_id,
    start_lat,
    start_lng,
    end_lat,
    end_lng,
    member_casual,
    is_bike_lost,
    is_return_to_dock,
    is_start_from_dock,
    distance,
    duration,
    speed_ms,
    speed_kmh,
    start_date,
    end_date,
    is_not_return_to_dock,
    is_not_start_from_dock,
    duration_min,
    duration_h
FROM 
    ExternalBluebike;
GO

-- Create and load DimAirPollution table
CREATE TABLE DimAirPollution (
    aqi INT,
    co FLOAT,
    no FLOAT,
    no2 FLOAT,
    o3 FLOAT,
    so2 FLOAT,
    pm2_5 FLOAT,
    pm10 FLOAT,
    nh3 FLOAT,
    id NVARCHAR(100)
);
GO

INSERT INTO DimAirPollution (
    aqi, 
    co, 
    no, 
    no2, 
    o3, 
    so2, 
    pm2_5, 
    pm10, 
    nh3, 
    id
)
SELECT DISTINCT
    aqi,
    co,
    no,
    no2,
    o3,
    so2,
    pm2_5,
    pm10,
    nh3,
    id
FROM
    ExternalAirPollution;

-- Create and load DimDate table
-- A dimension table focused on date attributes.
-- Provides date details like year, month, day, quarter,
-- and week, along with names for days and months, and a weekend indicator.

CREATE TABLE DimDate (
    date DATE,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT,
    quarter INT,
    week INT,
    day_of_week INT,
    day_name VARCHAR(10),
    month_name VARCHAR(10),
    is_weekend BIT
);
GO

-- Populate DimDate Table from ExternalBluebike
INSERT INTO DimDate (
    date, year, month, day,
    quarter, week, day_of_week, 
    day_name, month_name, is_weekend
)
SELECT DISTINCT
    CAST(date_time AS DATE) AS date,
    DATEPART(YEAR, date_time) AS year,
    DATEPART(MONTH, date_time) AS month,
    DATEPART(DAY, date_time) AS day,
    DATEPART(QUARTER, date_time) AS quarter,
    DATEPART(WEEK, date_time) AS week,
    DATEPART(WEEKDAY, date_time) AS day_of_week,
    DATENAME(WEEKDAY, date_time) AS day_name,
    DATENAME(MONTH, date_time) AS month_name,
    CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, date_time) IN (1, 7) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_weekend
FROM
    ExternalWeather;
GO

-- Create and load DimDateTime table
-- A dimension table that breaks down date and time components.
-- Contains detailed temporal information such as year, month, day, hour, minute, 
--and whether the date is a weekend.

CREATE TABLE DimDateTime (
    date_time DATETIME,
    date DATE,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT,
    hour INT,
    minute INT,
    second INT,
    quarter INT,
    week INT,
    day_of_week INT,
    day_name VARCHAR(10),
    month_name VARCHAR(10),
    is_weekend BIT
);
GO

INSERT INTO DimDateTime (date_time, date, year, month, day, 
hour, minute, second, quarter, week, 
day_of_week, day_name, month_name, is_weekend)
SELECT DISTINCT
    CAST(date_time AS DATETIME) AS date_time,
    CAST(date_time AS DATE) AS date,
    DATEPART(YEAR, date_time) AS year,
    DATEPART(MONTH, date_time) AS month,
    DATEPART(DAY, date_time) AS day,
    DATEPART(HOUR, date_time) AS hour,
    DATEPART(MINUTE, date_time) AS minute,
    DATEPART(SECOND, date_time) AS second,
    DATEPART(QUARTER, date_time) AS quarter,
    DATEPART(WEEK, date_time) AS week,
    DATEPART(WEEKDAY, date_time) AS day_of_week,
    DATENAME(WEEKDAY, date_time) AS day_name,
    DATENAME(MONTH, date_time) AS month_name,
    CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, date_time) IN (1, 7) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_weekend
FROM
    ExternalWeather;
GO

-- Create external table ExternalAggBikeStations

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ExternalAggBikeStations(
    station_name NVARCHAR(100), 
    station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    count INT,
    Latitude FLOAT,
    Longitude FLOAT,
    status NVARCHAR(100),
    District NVARCHAR(100),
    docks INT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'gold/agg_stations/parquet/agg_stations.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
);
GO

-- Create external table ExternalAggBluebike
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ExternalAggBluebike(
    date DATE, 
    riders INT,
    trips INT,
    stations INT,
    bikes_lost INT,
    bikes_not_returned INT,
    not_start_at_dock INT,

    avg_duration FLOAT,
    avg_duration_min FLOAT,
    avg_duration_h FLOAT,
    avg_speed_ms FLOAT,
    avg_speed_kmh FLOAT,
    max_distance FLOAT,
    max_duration FLOAT,
    max_duration_min FLOAT,
    max_duration_h FLOAT,
    max_speed_ms FLOAT,
    max_speed_kmh FLOAT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'gold/agg_bluebike/parquet/bluebike_agg.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
);
GO

WITH (

-- Create external table ExternalBikeStation

-- Create external table ExternalBluebike
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ExternalBluebike(
    ride_id NVARCHAR(100),
    rideable_type NVARCHAR(100),
    started_at DATETIME,
    ended_at DATETIME,
    start_station_name NVARCHAR(100),
    start_station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    end_station_name NVARCHAR(100),
    end_station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    start_lat FLOAT,
    start_lng FLOAT,
    end_lat FLOAT,
    end_lng FLOAT,
    member_casual NVARCHAR(100),
    is_bike_lost INT,
    is_return_to_dock INT,
    is_start_from_dock INT,
    distance FLOAT,
    duration FLOAT,
    speed_ms FLOAT,
    speed_kmh FLOAT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,

    is_not_start_from_dock INT,
    duration_min FLOAT,
    duration_h FLOAT
)

    DATA_SOURCE = MyDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
);
GO

-- Create ExternalWeather table with matching data types from databricks
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ExternalWeather(
    clouds_all SMALLINT,
    feels_like_K FLOAT,
    humidity SMALLINT,
    pressure SMALLINT,
    temp_K FLOAT,
    temp_max_K FLOAT,
    temp_min_K FLOAT,
    wind_deg SMALLINT,
    wind_gust FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    rain_1h REAL,
    corrected_timestamp INT,
    location NVARCHAR(100),
    date_time DATETIME,
    id NVARCHAR(100),
    temp_C FLOAT,
    temp_min_C FLOAT,
    temp_max_C FLOAT,
    feels_like_C FLOAT,
    temp_F FLOAT,
    temp_min_F FLOAT,
    temp_max_F FLOAT,
    feels_like_F FLOAT,
    lat FLOAT,
    lon FLOAT,
    weather_id_value integer,
    weather_mail_value NVARCHAR(100),
    weather_description_value NVARCHAR(100),
    weather_icon_value NVARCHAR(100)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'gold/processed_weather/processed_weather.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
);
GO

-- Create FactWeather table with matching data types

CREATE TABLE FactWeather(
    clouds_all SMALLINT,
    feels_like_K FLOAT,
    humidity SMALLINT,
    pressure SMALLINT,
    temp_K FLOAT,
    temp_max_K FLOAT,
    temp_min_K FLOAT,
    wind_deg SMALLINT,
    wind_gust FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    rain_1h REAL,
    corrected_timestamp INT,
    location NVARCHAR(100),
    date_time DATETIME,
    date DATE,
    id NVARCHAR(100),
    temp_C FLOAT,
    temp_min_C FLOAT,
    temp_max_C FLOAT,
    feels_like_C FLOAT,
    temp_F FLOAT,
    temp_min_F FLOAT,
    temp_max_F FLOAT,
    feels_like_F FLOAT,
    lat FLOAT,
    lon FLOAT,
    weather_id_value integer,
    weather_mail_value NVARCHAR(100),
    weather_description_value NVARCHAR(100),
    weather_icon_value NVARCHAR(100),
    weather_combined_value NVARCHAR(200)
)

-- Insert data into FactWeather
INSERT INTO FactWeather
SELECT
    clouds_all,
    feels_like_K,
    humidity,
    pressure,
    temp_K,
    temp_max_K,
    temp_min_K,
    wind_deg,
    wind_gust,
    wind_speed,
    rain_1h,
    corrected_timestamp,
    location,
    date_time,
    CAST(date_time AS DATE) AS date,
    id,
    temp_C,
    temp_min_C,
    temp_max_C,
    feels_like_C,
    temp_F,
    temp_min_F,
    temp_max_F,
    feels_like_F,
    lat,
    lon,
    weather_id_value,
    weather_mail_value,
    weather_description_value,
    weather_icon_value,
    CONCAT(weather_id_value, '_', weather_icon_value) AS weather_combined_value
FROM ExternalWeather;
GO

-- Create external table ExternalAggDateStations

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ExternalAggDateStations(
    start_date DATE,
    station_name NVARCHAR(100), 
    station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    count INT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'gold/agg_date_station/parquet/agg_date_station.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
);
GO

-- Create AggDateStations table with matching data types (internal sql table)

CREATE TABLE AggDateStations (
    start_date DATE,
    station_name NVARCHAR(100), 
    station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    count INT
);
GO

-- Insert data into AggDateStations

    station_name,

    count
